articles.title: Markets track Wall Street plunge on inflation woes, dollar rallies - CNA
articles.description: HONG KONG: Markets tumbled in Asia on Monday (Jun 13) to extend a global rout while the dollar soared after a forecast-beating United States inflation print ramped up bets on a more aggressive campaign of Federal Reserve interest rate hikes.
articles.content:
Wall Street's three main indexes tanked, with the Nasdaq taking the heaviest blow as tech firms - which are susceptible to higher rates - were battered, while European markets were also hammered.
